item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1111; 04:24PM; 8604 W La Tuna Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3kC1rF8; Shadow Hills; KNOCKDOWN: 50 firefighters extinguished a trailer and outside fire which also partially extended (severity of damage unknown at this time) to a two-car garage in 21 minutes. Two patients are being evaluated, male and female (age and condition unknown) for burn injuries. There are 'exotic' animals on site (number unknown) that were sequestered and are not injured. La Tuna Canyon Road is closed in both directions due to large-diameter hose lines on the street, please avoid the area. LAFD Arson and Counter-Terrorism Section is responding for the investigation. No further details.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC10 BC12 BC14 CM42 E24 E260 E274 E288 E289 E290 E298 E77 E89 E98 EM14 EM15 H2 HA2 HR3 RA60 RA77 RA860 RA889 T60 T74 T88 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1111; 04:14PM; 8604 W La Tuna Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3kC1rF8; Shadow Hills; Firefighters are making progress against the outside/trailer fire (exposed a single family dwelling and detached garage) while also addressing the evacuation of an unknown number of "exotic" (types unknown at this time) animals. One male patient, reported to have been in the involved trailer, is being treated for burn injuries. The extent of his injuries are unknown at this time.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 CM42 E24 E260 E274 E289 E290 E298 E77 E98 EM14 H2 HA2 RA60 RA77 RA860 RA889 T60 T74 T89 T90 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1111; 04:03PM; 8604 W La Tuna Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3kC1rF8; Shadow Hills; Initial reports of an outside fire that is exposing a detached shed. One patient being evaluated for undetermined burn injury. La Tuna Canyon Road is being closed in both directions.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 CM42 E24 E260 E274 E289 E298 E77 E98 EM14 RA60 RA860 RA889 T60 T74 T89 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Red Line - FATALITY; INC#1503; 06:05PM; 899 W 7th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/2UzBdZG; Downtown; Firefighters located a patient under the train and determined them deceased on scene (age / gender unknown at this time). Firefighters will assist with body recovery as needed for law enforcement and LA County Coroner. LAPD Inc# 3433. No further details.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC13 E11 E203 E211 E9 EM1 HR3 RA2 RA26 T11 T3 T9; CH7; 12 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0093; 01:38AM; 2325 W Ocean View Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qt7cZA; Westlake; LAFD responded to a three-story center-hall apartment house with fire in one unit on the third floor. Thirty-six firefighters extinguished the flames, held in check my residential fire sprinklers, in 12 minutes. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC11 E11 E20 E211 E220 E6 RA11 RA803 SQ21 T11 T20; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Boat Fire; INC#0999; 03:05PM; 1500 E Anchorage Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bY3dvh; San Pedro; LAFD responded by land and sea to find two power vessels, approximately 30 feet long, engulfed in flames. Thirty-two firefighters extinguished the flames in 30 minutes. No reports of individuals previously living on these vessels. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 49; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District outside city; BC6 BT3 BT4 E238 E285 E36 E38 E49 E85 T38 T85; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Boat Fire; INC#0999; 02:35PM; 1500 E Anchorage Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bY3dvh; San Pedro; Two vessels (in their slip) fully involved with fire. No additional units requested.; FS 49; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District outside city; BC6 BT3 BT4 E238 E285 E36 E38 E49 E85 T38 T85; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0911; 02:39PM; 744 S Hartford Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oeINEb; Westlake; *Greater Alarm* Firefighters arrived to find fire had moved through the crawl space, walls, and into the attic inside of a vacant two-story home, adjacent to a multi-story residential apartment building. Several additional task forces responded due to the proximity of the multi-story apartment building, which was ultimately spared. Over 100 firefighters aggressively engaged in a coordinated attack, overcoming forcible entry challenges, to vertically ventilate the structure and extinguish the flames in 35 minutes. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC4 BC5 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E2 E203 E210 E211 E215 E226 E229 E235 E26 E3 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA11 RA3 RA803 RA804 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T26 T29 T3 T35 T9 UR3; CH9; 12 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0911; 02:04PM; 744 S Hartford Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oeINEb; Westlake; Vacant (boarded-up) two-story craftsman with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E10 E210 E211 E9 RA11 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Rubbish Fire; INC#1744; 11:15PM; 9605 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3of8Vyy; Sunland; Outside rubbish fire at or near a large homeless encampment. The fire has been extinguished. One burn patient transported in critical condition. LAFD Fire Investigators en route. Nothing further. LAPD Inc #4549.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC12 E274 E474 E77 E98 RA74 RA98 T74 WT77; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
